s.text: The revelries are to continue for two full years, with a traveling lecture series featuring such speakers as William Bennett, who will orate in Oklahoma City about "Truth," and Clarence Thomas, who will address the people of Palm Beach on the subject of "Character."
You can't conceive of Brookings putting out a volume of self-serving bluster like the Edwards book.
A right-wing "advocacy tank" like Heritage is able to raise much more than its liberal counterparts for the same reason that Republican candidates out-raise Democratic ones.
